a-z-list-of-criteria.description:
Inform our medical staff if you have had acupuncture in the last 12 months.



If the acupuncture was done using sterile, single use or disposable needles, you will be allowed to donate.



If the acupuncture was not done using sterile, single use, disposable needles (or if you are not sure), you can donate 12 months after the last acupuncture procedure.



For more information or if you need further clarification, please call 6213 0626 and speak to our medical staff.
